text: Summerhays is a surname. Notable people with the surname include: *Bob Summerhays (1927–2017), American football player *Bruce Summerhays (born 1944), American professional golfer and Mormon leader *Daniel Summerhays (born 1983), American professional golfer *Gary Summerhays (born 1950), Canadian professional light heavy/cruiserweight boxer *Jane Summerhays (born 1944), American actress *R. S. Summerhays (d. 1976), British expert and author in equine matters *Robert R. Summerhays (born 1965), American judge
title: Summerhays
